name: Course Correction
description:
The goal of the game is simple.  Collect all of the orbs to open the level gate to proceed to the next level.  

This was created for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2.  This is my first foray into game development so feedback is appreciated!

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4

Controls:
Arrow Keys, D-Pad, Left Analog Stick = Move Left and Right 
Space Bar, Up Arrow Key, D-Pad Up, DualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B = Jump
Shift, R2 = Fast Forward
X, DualShock Square, Xbox X, Nintendo Y = Rewind 
Z, DualShock Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A = Pause Player
Esc, Start, DualShock Options, Nintendo + = Pause Game

Credits:
Background Courtesy of https://opengameart.org/content/space-background-7
Character, Orbs, and Tile Assets Courtesy of https://www.openpixelproject.com/
Note: Respawn and Death Animations of the Open Pixel Project character were created by me 
Laser Cannon and Blue barriers were created by me
